txt.en: DNT
Zudramdân can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should talk to Náth at Zudramdân.
Defeat Orkish forces in Elderslade ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The dwarves here have just only recently secured Zudramdân
Planted banners ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Talk to Náth at Zudramdân
'Good work, [placeholder]. We will hold onto Zudramdân for as long as we can. I am weary of the growing numbers of Orcs by the walls of Gundabad. I see more with each passing hour.'
Defeated Orkish forces ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Zudramdân can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should journey to Zudramdân.
To Zudramdân
Agátur the Boastful has asked you to plant banners along the road leading to Zudramdân.\n\nYou should plant banners along the road leading to Zudramdân.
Journey to Zudramdân

'I have just received word that the Gabil'akkâ have secured Zudramdân, to the north! This is indeed a victory, as Zudramdân is a strategic point for staging an assault against Gundabad. You must travel to Zudramdân immediately, as we will need as many warriors there as is possible. On your way there, place some banners along the road to bring strength to all in the Gabil'akkâ!\n\n'I believe that our friend, Náth, was one of the group that took Zudramdân. If you see him, give him my thanks!'
The Gabil'akkâ has secured Zudramdân in Elderslade.
DNT
Zudramdân can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should talk to Náth at Zudramdân.
DNT
Orkish forces can be found in Elderslade.\n\nYou should assist the dwarves at Zudramdân.
Talk to Náth at Zudramdân

'The taking of Zudramdân was barely a battle, [placeholder]. Most of the Orcs just fled, instead of fighting. If you ask me, I found it quite odd. I would be grateful if you were to defeat some Orcs in Elderslade. Those who fled Zudramdân could not have gotten far.'
Plant banners along the road leading to Zudramdân ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
